nso: phethagatšo ya molao wo e tla fihla kgole kudu go netefatša gore melato e sekwa ka katlego, gore bao ba phologilego bosenyi bjo ba a šireletšwa le gore go ba le magato ao a lego gona a go šitiša bosenyi go phethagala.
zul: kuzoba khona izinsiza zokuqasha nokuqeqesha amaphoyisa amasha ayizi-12 000 ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uphiko lwamaphoyisa eningizimu afrika luthola abasebenzi elibadingayo ngokushesha.

nso: re fihleletše kgatelopele ye kgolo go fokotša tšhalelomorago ya go tsenyeletšwa ga di-dna gore di kgonthišišwe, ka go di fokotša go tloga go disampolo tše 210 000 ka moranang 2021 go fihla go 58 000 gonabjale.
zul: enye ingxenye edinga ukunkwa ngokushesha kuzoba ukusungulwa kabusha kwamaphoyisa omphakathi ukwenza ngcono ubudlelwano kanye nokulawula okungcono phakathi kwamaphoyisa endawo kanye nabahlali ezindaweni azisebenzelayo.

nso: le ge go le bjalo, re ka se ke ra thopa ntwa kgahlanong le dikgaruru tša go hlolwa ke bong ntle fela ge, bjalo ka setšhaba, re huetša le go rapa mathoko ka moka a badudi ka moka go thekga lenaneo la go dula le tšwelapele la magato a setšhaba.
zul: kucace bha ngokubuka kwethimba longoti ukuthi sidinga ukusebenzisa indlela ebandakanya wonke umuntu ukucwaninga izinsongo ezibhekiswe ekuphepheni kwezwe lethu kanye nokuthola izindlela zokubhekana nalokhu.

nso: ka baka la ge leuba la covid-19 le re bontšhitše bohlogo bja lona bjo bo šiišago, lephelo la setšhaba gotee le kgatelopele ya ekonomi le tlhabollo ya leago di bjalo ka monwana le lenala.
zul: nginxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo ukuthi babe yingxenye yokuthuthukisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lezokuphepha lethu.

nso: ka baka la ge ditherišano tša molaokakanywa wa inšorense ya bosetšhaba ya maphelo (nhi) di tšwelapele palamenteng, go fihleletšwe kgatelopele ye kgolo go lokišetša go tsebagatšwa ga nhi.
zul: abezokuphepha banikwe umsebenzi ngumkhandlu wezokuphepha kuzwelonke ukuthi basungule izinhlelo eziphuthumayo zokuqalisa ukulandela uchungechunge lwezincomo ezenziwe ithimba longoti.

nso: ge ditiragalo tša dikolo di boela sekeng, re tla šoma ka thata go netefatša gore barutwana ka moka le baithuti ba hwetša thuto ya makgonthe yeo ba e hlokago ebile e ba swanelago.
zul: ukuqaliswa kokusebenza kwalo mthetho kuzosiza kakhulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amacala ashushiswa ngempumelelo, nokuthi abasindile bayavikelwa futhi kunezinto eziningi ezizogwema lokhu.

nso: se se tla akaretša magato a boima a go goketša bahlankedi ba setšhaba, tlhabollo ya go se kgaotše ya profešene ka sekolo sa bosetšhaba sa mmušo le ditirišano magareng ga ditho tša mmušo, mekgatlo ya profešene le diyunibesithi.
zul: noma kunjalo, impi yodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile angeke siyinqobe ngaphandle, uma njengomphakathi, sinxenxa bonke abantu ngokwehlukahlukana kwabo kanye nezakhamuzi zonke ukuthi zibe yingxenye yohlelo lokusukuma komphakathi.

nso: tlhakišo ya ka fao batho ba phelago ka gona e gare e ya phethagatšwa go potologa ditirelo ka moka tša mmušo.
zul: njengoba i-covid-19 isibonise ngokumangazayo, ezempilo zesizwe angeke ziyihlukanise nenqubekela-phambili yomnotho kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi.

nso: ngwaga wo, re tla tšwelapele ka phethagatšo ya mmotlolo wa phokoletšo ya ditseka (ddm).
zul: ngakho-ke sizoqhubeka nomsebenzi oqhubekayo wokuqinisekisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezempilo kuwo wonke umuntu eningizimu afrika, ngaphandle nokubheka ukuthi bayakwazi ukukukhokhela na.

nso: mmotlolo wo o kopantšha mmogo didiko ka moka tše tharo tša mmušo gotee le badirišani ba bangwe setšhabeng tikologong ye nngwe le ye nngwe go godiša ekonomi ya go akaretša tšohle ka mo nageng le go kaonafatša maphelo a badudi.
zul: ngesikhathi ukulalelwa komphakathi mayelana nomthethosivivinywa wezempilo kuzwelonke (i-nhi) kuqhubeka ephalamende, inqubekela-phambili enkulu iyenziwa ekulungiseleleni ukwethulwa kwe-nhi.

nso: le ge e le gore sars e ile ya senywa kudu ke go gogwa ga mmušo ka nko, e fihleletše diphenyo tše di makatšago kudu go bušetša sekeng potego, tshephagalo le phethagatšo ye botse ya mošomo.
zul: yingakho sibeke eqhulwini ukwakha umbuso onekhono, onomthetho nothuthukayo.

nso: mmušo wo o nago le bokgoni ga o mabapi fela le khwalithi ya bahlankedi ba mmušo le bokgoni bja ditheo.
zul: maduze-nje sizophothula uhlaka lokusebenza ngendlela efanele kuhulumeni.

nso: ka tsela ya maleba, o mabapi le ka fao badudi ba matlafatšwago gore le bona ba kgathe tema.
zul: lokhu kuzofaka phakathi izinyathelo eziqinile zokuqashwa kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni, ukuthuthukiswa okuqhubekayo kokusebenza ngendlela ngokusebenzisana nesikole sikahulumeni kuzwelonke nokusebenzisana phakathi kwezinhlangano zikahulumeni, izinhlangano zabasebenzi namanyuvesi.

nso: re swanetše go šoma mmogo go netefatša gore dilo tša go swana le makgotlataolo a dikolo le diforamo tša maphodisa setšhabeng di šoma ka mafolofolo kudu le go akaretša bohle.
zul: ucwaningo ngendlela yokuphila luvele seluqalile kwezemisebenzi kahulumeni.

nso: mekgatlo ye e lego setšhabeng ye nago le mošito e bohlokwa gore re fihlelele mmušo wa bokgoni le kgatelopele.
zul: le ndlela iletha ndawonya zonke izinhlaka ezintathu zikahulumeni kanye nabanye esisebenzisana nabo emphakathini kuzo zonke izifunda ukuze kuzokhuliswa iminotho yendawo nokwenza ngcono izimpilo zezakhamuzi.

nso: ka gona, re tla be re šomišana le badirišani ba rena ba setšhabeng go swara samiti yeo e lego kgale e letetšwe ya lefapha la leago.
zul: ikakhulukazi, i-ddm ibheka ukuhlelwa okuhlanganisile kanye nokwabiwa kwezimali kuyo yonke imikhakha kahulumeni futhi ithuthukisa ukuhlanganiswa kwemiklamo kazwelonke ezingeni lesifunda.

nso: samiti ye e šetšane le go kaonafatša kamano magareng ga mmušo le mekgatlo ye e lego gona setšhabeng le go rarolla ditlhohlo tšeo di lebaganego le mekgatlo yeo e sego ya mmušo le mekgatlo yeo e ikadilego setšhabeng.
zul: ngesikhathi kunezingxenye eziningi zikahulumeni ezidinga umsebenzi omkhulu, kunezikhungo eziqhubeka nokusiza abantu baleli lizwe lakithi ngendlela efanele nangempumelelo.

nso: molokoloko wa dikhuetšo, tšeo bontši bja tšona di lego ka godimo ga taolo ya rena, di re fihlišitše mo re lego gona lehono.
zul: yize i-sars yayithunjwe kakhulu ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, isiyenze inqubekela-phambili emangalisayo ekugcineni ubuqotho, ukuthembeka kanye nemiphumela yokusebenza.

nso: sepikara sa seboka sa maloko a palamente (na), mohumagadi nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula,modulasetulo wa lekgotla la setšhaba la diprofense (ncop), morena amos masondo,motlatšamopresidente david mabuza,meyara wa mmasepala wa motsekapa, morena geordin hill-lewis,mopresidente wa peleng thabo mbeki,motlatšamopresidente wa peleng baleka mbete,mopresidente wa palamente ya afrika, mohlomphegimogolo fortune charumbira, moahlodimogolo raymond zondo le maloko a lefapha la baohloodidihlogo tša diinstitušene tša go thekga temokrasi,motlatšamopresidente wa mokgatlo woo o bušago, morena paul mashatile le baetapele ba mekgatlo ka moka, maloko a palamente,maafrika borwa ao a rategago,ke tlhompho ye kgolo go ema mo pele ga lena bošegong bjo go aba polelo ya maemo a setšhaba.
zul: somlomo wesigungu sikazwelonke, unks nosiviwe mapisa-nqakula, sihlalo womkhandlu kazwelonke wezifundazwe, umnu amos masondo,iphini likamongameli u-david mabuza, usodolobha wedolobha lasekapa, umnu geordin hill-lewis, umongameli waphambilini uthabo mbeki, iphini likamongameli laphambilini ubaleka mbete, umongameli wephalamende lamazwe ase-afrika, umhlonishwa inkosi u-fortune charumbira, inhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo kanye namalungu ophiko lwezobulungiswa, izinhloko zezikhungo ezeseka intando yeningi labantu, iphini likamongameli weqembu elibusayo, umnu paul mashatile kanye nabo bonke abaholi bamaqembu, amalungu ephalamende, bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, kuyintokozo enkulu ukuma phambi kwenu kusihlwa nje ngethule inkulumo echaza isimo sezwe.

nso: ka ge re le naga yeo e sa hlalošwego ke mawatle le dinoka tšeo di dirago mellwane ya naga ya rena.
zul: thina asisona neze isizwe esigabe kuphela ngezilwandle nemifula eyakhe imingcele yezwe lethu.

nso: ga re hlalošwe ke diminerale ka fase ga lefase la rena goba tikologo ye kgolo ka godimo ga rena.
zul: asigabile kuphela ngezimbiwa ezingaphansi komhlaba wethu noma ubuhle obumangalisayo bezintaba, amagquma namathafa angaphezu kwawo.

nso: ga re hlaloše gape ke dipolelo tšeo re di bolelago goba dikoša tšeo re di opelago goba mošomo wo re o dirago.
zul: asigabile ngisho nangezilimi esizikhulumayo noma amaculo esiwaculayo noma umsebenzi esiwenzayo.

nso: se bohlokwa kudu go rena, naga yeo e hlalošwago ke tshepo le maatla.
zul: kepha okusemqoka kakhulu thina siyisizwe esigabe kakhulu ngethemba namandla okumelana nezimo ezinzima.

nso: ke tshepo yeo e dirilego gore re kgone go swarelela ntweng ya rena ya tokologo, gape ke tshepo yeo e dirago gore re tielele ge re ntšha naga ya rena ka gare ga mathata gomme dilo di thoma go kaonafala.
zul: yithemba elakhuthaza futhi lagqugquzela ukuqhubeka nokusimama komzabalazo wethu wenkululeko, futhi yithemba elisinika amandla nogqozi ngenkathi siqhuba izwe lethu okomkhumbi ohamba olwandle olugubha amagagasi uphokophele emanzini acwebileyo.

nso: le ka nako ye ya mathata, ke tshepo yeo e dirago gore re swarelele le go re matlafatša gore re fenye mathata a magolo.
zul: ngisho kulezi zikhathi ezinzima imbala, yithemba elisinikeza amandla okuqhubekela phambili futhi elikhuthaza ukuzimisela kwethu ukunqoba ngisho obukhulukazi ubunzima.

nso: mo mengwageng ye meraro ya go feta, naga ya rena e hlasetšwe ke leuba le lešoro leo le hlasetšego lefase ka moka leo le sa kago la bonwa.
zul: eminyakeni emithathu nje edlulile, izwe lethu labe likhahlanyezwe wubhubhane olukhulukazi emhlabeni olungakaze lubonakale emlandweni.

nso: go lobilwe maphelo a dikete, dikhamphani tša tswalelwa, gwa lobja mešomo.
zul: bayizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane abantu abalahlekelwa yimiphefumulo yabo, nezinkampani ezavalwa, nemisebenzi eyalahleka.

nso: covid-19 ga se ya dira gore re felelwe ke tshepo goba gona go re šarakantšha.
zul: ukukhahlanyezwa yi-covid-19 akusiphendulanga amavaka sigcine sesifake imisila phakathi kwemilenze okwengcanga noma siphelelwe yithemba.

nso: ka go šoma mmogo re fentše masetlapelo, gomme re thomile go tsoša hlogo.
zul: ngokusebenza ngokubambisana sasinqoba leso simo esinzima, futhi sesiqalile ukusimama.

nso: lehono ekonomi ya rena e gotše go feta ka moo e bego e le gona pele ga leuba.
zul: namuhla umnotho wethu usumkhulu kunalokho owabe uyikona ngaphambi kobhubhane.

nso: gare ga kotara ya boraro ya 2021 le 2022, go hlotšwe mešomo ye mefsa yeo e ka bago milione o tee le seripa mo ekonoming ya rena.
zul: phakathi kwekota yesithathu yowezi-2021 neyowezi-2022, abalelwa kwisigidi nesigamu amathuba amasha omsebenzi adalekile emnothweni wethu.

nso: dithekgo tša mošomo tša mopresidente di file dibaka tša mešomo le letseno go batho ba go feta milione o tee.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi seluhlinzeke ngamathuba omsebenzi nezindlela zokuziphilisa kubantu abevile esigidini esisodwa.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, barutwana ba rena ba marematlou ba fentše ditlamorago tša leuba gomme ba tšwelela ka 80% gomme re a ba lebogiša ka katlego yeo ya bona ye kgolo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule abafundi bethu bakamatikuletsheni bayishaya ngembibizane imithelela yobhubhane ngokuthi bazuze izinga lokuphasa elingama-80% futhi siyabahalalisela ngaleyo mpumelelo yabo enkulukazi.

nso: re bona moya wo wa boikgafo go borabokgabo/mmabokgabo, borammino/bommamino, badiragatši, bangwadi le boradipapadi/mmadipapadi, bao ba šomago gabotse mo gae, kontinenteng le lefaseng ka bophara.
zul: lo moya wokuzimisela nokuphikelela siyawubona kumaciko ethu, abaculi, abalingisi, ababhali kanye nabadlali besilisa nabesifazane, abenza umsebenzi oncomekayo lapha ekhaya, ezwekazini kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

nso: banyana banyana ba šomile gabotse gomme ba dira gore re ikgantšhe ka bona ge ba thopa sefoka sa afrika sa basadi gomme ya ba dinkgwete tša afrika.
zul: ibanyana banyana yasenza siziqhenye ngenkathi idla umhlanganiso emqhudelwaneni wendebe yabesifazane yase-afrika ukuze ibe ngoshampeni base-afrika.

nso: zakes bantwini, nomcebo zikode le wouter kellerman ba šomile gabotse gomme ba dira gore re ikgantšhe ka bona mo difokeng tša grammy ka tirašano ya bona, bayethe.
zul: u-zakes bantwini, nonomcebo zikode kanye no-wouter kellerman basenze saziqhayisa emcimbini wezindondo ama-grammy award ngenoni lengoma abayivubele ngokuhlanganyela esihloko sithi bayethe.

nso: seo re se fihleletšego bjalo ka naga mo mengwageng ya go feta, le ge go be go na le ditlhohlo, se re gopotša gore tshepo ya afrika borwa e gona.
zul: lokho esikuzuzile njengesizwe kulo nyaka odlule, nakuba sinazo izinselele, kuyasikhumbuza ukuthi isithembiso seningizimu afrika siyaphila.

nso: tšwelopele yeo re e bonego e swanetše go re fa hlohleletšo ge re lebelela bokamoso bjo bokaone.
zul: inqubekela phambili esiyibonile kumele isinike isibindi ngenkathi sibheke phambili kwingomuso elingcono.

nso: gape, ke bolela le lena bošegong bja lehono, ka magae go phatlalala le naga, batho ba bantši ba a tshwenyega, ba bantši ba a ngongorega, ba bantši ga ba na bonnete gomme ba bantši ga ba na tshepo.
zul: kepha-ke nakuba kunjalo, njengoba ngikhuluma nani kusihlwa nje, emakhaya ezweni lonkana, abantu badlala inhlupheko, abaningi bakhathazekile, abaningi abanakho ukuqiniseka futhi abaningi abanalo ithemba.

nso: eupša ka se ke na le bonnete.
zul: kodwa-ke mina engiqinisekile ngakho yilokhu.

nso: go ka ba go na le mathata ka nako ye, go ka ba go na le masetlapelo ao re lebanego le wona, re tla ema ka maoto gomme ra lebana le wona mmogo gomme, mmogo, re tla a fenya.
zul: noma ngabe ngobunjani ubunzima obukhona kulo mzuzu, noma ngabe yisimo esinzima kangakanani esibhekene naso, thina sizosukuma sibhekane nalokhu ngokuhlanganyela, futhi ngokubambisana sizonqoba.

nso: se, re tla kgona go se dira ge re šoma mmogo gomme re sa tlogele motho morago.
zul: lokhu sizokwazi ukukwenza uma sisebenzisana futhi engekho noyedwa umuntu esimshiya ngemuva.

nso: re kopane mo ka nako ya masetlapelo.
zul: sibuthene lapha esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima.

nso: naga ya rena, mo dikgweding tše dintši, e bile le kgaotšo ya mohlagase nako ye telele yeo e hlotšego tshenyo ye kgolo mo ekonoming ya rena.
zul: sekuphele eziningi izinyanga izwe lethu likhungethwe yinkinga enkulukazi yokushoda kukagesi esidale umonakalo omkhulu emnothweni wethu.

nso: mengwaga ye mebedi pele ga moo, setšhaba sa rena se hlasetšwe ke leuba la covid-19 leo le hlotšego tahlegelo ye ntši ya maphelo le matshwenyego a mantši.
zul: futhi eminyakeni emibili ngaphambi kwalokho, umphakathi wethu wabe ukhahlanyezwe wubhubhane olwadala ukulahleka kwemiphefumulo eminingi kanye nobunzima obukhulu.

nso: leuba le dirile gore maemo a mpefale le go feta go tlhokego ya mešomo, ka ge naga e lahlegetšwe ke mešomo ye dimilione tše pedi.
zul: ubhubhane lwasenza saba sibi kakhulu isimo sokuntuleka kakhulu kwamathuba omsebenzi, njengoba izwe lalahlekelwa yimisebenzi eyizigidi ezimbili.

nso: leuba le amile letseno gampe gomme la oketša bohloki.
zul: ubhubhane lwaba nomthelela omubi kakhulu kwizindlela abaziphilisa ngazo abantu futhi lwakhuphula nobubha.

nso: ka mosegamanye 2021, re itemogetše dikgaruru tšeo di se a kago tša bonwa le tshenyo mo historing ya temokrasi ya rena, tša hlola mahu a go feta 300. ngwaga wa go feta,dikarolo tša kapa bohlabela, kwazulu-natal le leboa bodikela di hlasetšwe ke masetlapelo a mafula ao a hlotšego mahu a mantši, tshenyo ya magae le ya infrastraktšha.
zul: ngontulikazi wezi-2021, sazithola sibhekene nodlame lomphakathi olubi nokucekelwa phansi kwempahla okubi kakhulu emlandweni wombuso wethu wentando yeningi labantu, okwabangela ukushona kwabantu abangaphezu kwama-300.

nso: kgaotšo ya mohlagse e ra gore malapa le mabenkele a magolo a ka se kgone go bea dijo tše difsa, kabo ya meetse le yona e a šitišwa, diroboto ga di šome gomme mekgotha ga e na mabone bošego.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, izingxenye zempumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali kanye nenyakatho ntshonalanga zahlaselwa yizikhukhula ezadala umonakalo omkhulu ezadlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abaningi, zacekela phansi izindlu futhi zalimaza nengqalasizinda.

nso: ka ntle ga kabo ya maleba ya mohlagase, maitapišo a rena a go godiša ekonomi ye e akaretšago batho ka moka yeo e hlolago mešomo gomme ya fokotša bohloki a ka se atlege.
zul: futhi manje, ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okulokhu kuqhubeke njalo kuphazamisa ukululama kwethu kwimithelela yalezi zigameko.

nso: ka gona, ge re beakanya lenaneo la rena la ngwaga, mošomo wa rena wa ka pela ke go fokotša kudu sehlogo sa kgaotšo ya mohlagase mo dikgweding tše di tlago gomme mafelelong re fediše kgaotšo ya mohlagase go ya go ile.
zul: siyazi ukuthi ngaphandle kokuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembakele, amabhizinisi ngeke akwazi ukukhula, izimboni ngeke zikwazi ukukhiqiza imikhiqizo yazo, izitshalo ngeke zichelelwe futhi ziyaphazamiseka nezinsiza eziyisisekelo.

nso: ka gona, re, nepišitše go dikgato tšeo di tla re tšwelago mohola gonabjale, tšeo di tla dirago gore go be le tšwelopele ya nnete mo ngwageng wa go latela tšeo di tla dirago gore go be le wo re swarelelago ka wone ge re bušetša maemo sekeng le go tsena mo bokamosong bja rena.
zul: ngaphandle kokuphakelwa kukagesi okuthembakele, izobhuntsha imizamo yethu yokukhulisa umnotho obandakanyayo odala amathuba omsebenzi futhi onciphisa ububha.

nso: mo polelong ye ga re bolele ka maano a mafsa, goba gona go bolela ka lenaneo ka botlalo la mmušo.
zul: ngakho-ke, njengoba sichazela izwe kafushane ngohlelokusebenza lwethu lwalo nyaka esiwuphethe, umsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha okukhulu wukuthi kulezi zinyanga ezizayo sikunciphise kakhulu ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga futhi ekugcineni sikuqede nya ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

nso: ge re be re lebane le tlhohlo ye kgolo ya kgethollo, ga se ra ineela go kgatelelo yeo mmušo wa kgethollo o bego o e gapeletša batho ba rena.
zul: uma sisebenza ngokubambisana futhi sithatha izinyathelo ngaphandle kovalo nokunanaza, singashiyi noyedwa umuntu ngemuva, sizokwazi ukuxazulula izinselele zethu.

nso: re tiile gomme ra tšwela pele ka go lwa, ka tshepo ya gore motheo wa rena o tla tšwelela.
zul: le nkulumo echaza isimo sezwe (i-sona) iphathelene nokubona ithemba esimweni lapho kubonakala khona ukuphelelwa yithemba.

nso: re ka gare ga mathatha a magolo a mohlagase, ao a bakilwego ke diphošo tšeo di dirilwego mengwaga ye mentši ya go feta.
zul: ngenkathi sibhekene nenselele enkulukazi yobandlululo asizange siphonse ithawula, samukele ingcindezelo yombuso wobandlululo phezu kwabantu bakithi.

nso: re ka se kgone go dirolla diphošo tšeo di dirilwego nakong ya go feta, e lego bokgoni bjoo bo se a agwago, tshenyo yeo e dirilwego go ditiši tša mohlagase ka lebaka la go se hlokomelwe, goba ditlamorago tša go goga mmušo ka nko mo diinstitušeneng tša rena.
zul: sabhekana nayo ngqo, sazabalaza, ngethemba lokuthi sizonqoba.

nso: lona e be e le la go šogana le hlaelelo ya mohlagase wa dimekawate (mw) tše 4 000 go fihla go tše 6 000. leano le akareditše ditsenogare tše hlano tše dikgolo:sa mathomo, go lokiša ditiši tša go fehla mohlagase tša malahla tša eskom le go kaonafatša tšeo di lego gona tšeo e lego tšona di dutšego di aba mohlagase.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu eseqhulwini okumele sibhekane nayo ngokushesha wukuqinisekisa ukuthi kubuyela esimweni esijwayelekile ukuphakelwa kukagesi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi ugesi utholakala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

nso: sa bobedi, go dumelela le go potlakiša peeletšo ya praebete mo ditirelong tša tšweletšo ya mohlagase.
zul: sibhekene nenkinga enzima kakhulu yokuntuleka kukagesi, okuyinto eyaqala ngenxa yokungaqhutshwa kwezinto ngendlela efanele eminyakeni eminingi edlule.

nso: sa boraro, go potlakiša go reka mohlagase o mofsa wo o dirwago ka mekgwa e mefsa, gase le polokelo ya mohlagase wa petiri.
zul: ngeke neze sikwazi ukuguqula nokwesula amaphutha enzeka esikhathini esedlule, amaphutha omsebenzi ongenziwanga wokwakha iziphehlagesi nokuhlinzeka ngezinsizakusebenza ezifanele, umonakalo owenziwa ezikhungweni zethu eziphehla ugesi ngenxa yokungalungiswa kwazo ukuze zihlale zisesimweni esikahle sokusebenza, noma imithelela yokubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso okwenzeka ezikhungweni zethu.

nso: sa bone, go dumelela dikgwebo le malapa go beeletša go didirišwa tše di dulago godimo ga marulelo tša mohlagase wa letšaši.
zul: esingakwenza thina namuhla wukulungisa le nkinga, siqinisekise ukuthi ugesi uhlala ukhona njalo ngomuso futhi uhlale ukhona njalo nasezizukulwaneni ezizayo.

nso: sa bohlano, go fetoša kudu lekala la mohlagase go fihlelela tšhireletšo ya mohlagse wa nako ye telele.
zul: ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela uhlelo lokusebenza olucacile lokubhekana nenkinga kagesi.

nso: re tšere dikgato tša go kaonafatša phethagatšo ya ditiši tša go fehla mohlagase tša eskom tšeo di lego gona gore ditiši tša go fehla mohlagase tša malahla tšeo di abago 80% ya mohlagase wa rena di tšweletša mohlagase woo di o dirilego.
zul: lokhu kwenzelwe ukulungisa inkinga yokushoda kukagesi ongamamegawathi (mw) ayizi-4 000 kuya kwizi-6 000. lolu hlelo lwabalula izindlela ezinhlanu ezimqoka kakhulu zokungenelela: okokuqala, ukulungisa iziteshi zika-eskom eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle kanye nokwenza ngcono ukutholakala kukagesi ophakelwayo njengamanje.

nso: ka fase ga boto ya yona ye mpsha, eskom e thwala batho le didirišwa go kaonafatša go šoma gabotse ga ditiši tše tshela tša mohlagase tšeo di kgathilego tema kudu gore go be le kgaolo ya mohlagase.
zul: okwesibili, ukuvumela nokusheshisa utshalomali oluvela kubatshalizimali abazimele ekuphehlweni kwamandla kagesi.

nso: eskom e potlakiša ka lebelo kago ya tharollo ya nakwana go buša diyuniti tše tharo mo setišing sa go fehla mohlagase sa kusile go latela go wa ga tšhemele ngwaga wa go feta, mola ka go le lengwe ba lokiša moago wa go ya go ile.
zul: okwesithathu, ukusheshisa ukuthengwa kwamandla kagesi amasha kulabo abakhiqiza ugesi ovuselelekayo, ugesi ophehlwa ngegesi kanye nogesi ophehlwa bese ugcinwa kumabhethri.

nso: re aga lefsa mabokgoni ao a lahlegilego gomme re šetše re kaladitše bašomi bao ba nago le mabokgoni mo maemong a godimo gore ba romelwe mo ditišing tša go fehla mohlagase tšeo di sa šomego gabotse.
zul: okwesine, ukuvumela amabhizinisi kanye namakhaya ukuthi azithengele ubuchwepheshe bukagesi welanga obubekwa phezu kophahla.

nso: khansele ya boentšenere ya afrika borwa e ithaopile go re fa thušo ye ntši yeo e nyakegago ka go romela dientšenere go šoma le dihlopha tša balaodi mo ditišing tša go fehla mohlagase.
zul: okwesihlanu, ukuguqula kakhulu umkhakha kagesi ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukutholakala kukagesi ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi lokhu kuqhubeke isikhathi eside.

nso: kgoro ya matlotlo a setšhaba e phetha ka tharollo ya sekoloto sa eskom sa r400 bilione ka mokgwa wa go kwagala gape wa toka go bakgathatema ka moka, woo o tla kgontšhago tirelo go dira dipeeletšo tšeo di hlokegago mo go tlhokomelo le mohlagase.
zul: ongoti bayavuma ukuthi lolu hlelo yiyona ndlela engasebenza futhi iphumelele uma iqhathaniswa nezinye ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

nso: mmušo o tla thekga eskom go šireletša thekgo ya tlaleletšo go reka tisele ngwageng ka moka wa ditšhelete.
zul: sithathe izinyathelo zokwenza ngcono ukusebenza kweziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi zika-eskom ezikhona njengamanje ukuze iziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle ezihlinzeka ama-80% kagesi wethu zikwazi ukukhiqiza umthamo kagesi ezazakhelwe ukuwukhiqiza.

nso: se se tla fokotša bošoro bja kgaotšo ya mohlagase ka ge eskom e tla kgona go šomiša tisele ya yona ya go dirwa ka dimela ge lenaneo le imelwa.
zul: ngaphansi kwebhodi lakhe elisha, u-eskom ujube abantu kanye nezinsiza ukwenza ngcono ukuthembakala nokusebenza ngendlela efanele kweziteshi eziphehla amandla kagesi eziyisithupha okuyizona ezibe nesandla esikhulu ekucinyweni kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.

nso: eskom e thakgotše lenaneo la go reka mohlagase wo montši go tšwa go batšweletši ba praebete gomme e šetše e na le 300 mw go tšwa dinageng tša baagišane.
zul: u-eskom usheshisa kakhulu umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesixazululo sesikhashana sokulungisa nokubuyisela emsebenzini amayunithi amathathu esiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ikusile kulandela ukubhidlika kwengxenye kashemula walesi sikhungo ngonyaka odlule, futhi kusenjalo kwakhiwe isakhiwo sanomphela.

nso: tirelo ya maphodisa a afrika borwa (saps) e thomile sehlopha sa boikgafo sa go ba le baetapele ba maemo a godimo go šogana le bomenetša ka kakaretšo le bohodu mo ditišing tše mmalwa tša go fehla mohlagase tšeo di kgathilego tema go šome gabotse ga ditiši tše.
zul: sakha kabusha amakhono alahlekile futhi sesiqalile kakade ukuqasha abasebenzi abanamakhono emazingeni aphezulu abazothunyelwa eziteshini eziphehla amandla kagesi ezingawenzi ngendlela egculisayo umsebenzi wazo.

nso: ditshepedišo tša mahlale mo ditišing tše di dirile gore batho ba 43 ba swarwe.
zul: umkhandlu wezobunjiniyela waseningizimu afrika usuthembisile ukuthi ungahlinzeka ngalo lonke usizo oludingekayo ngokuthi uthumele onjiniyela ukuze basebenzisane namathimba abaphathi eziteshini eziphehla amandla kagesi.

nso: bjalo ka karolo ya tshepetšo ya mpshafatšo ye kgolo, go beakanywa lefsa ga eskom moo re go tsebišitšego nakong ya go feta e tšwela pele gomme khamphani ya mohlagase ya setšhaba kgauswanyane e tla thoma go šoma ka boto ya go ikema.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke uphothula isixazululo maqondana nesikweletu sika-eskom esiyizigidigidi ezingama-400 zamarandi, ngendlela engenzeleli futhi enobulungiswa kubo bonke ababambiqhaza, okuzokwenza ukuthi le nkampani ikwazi ukutshala izimali emsebenzini wokulungiswa nokugcinwa kwezikhungo zisesimweni sokusebenza esikahle kanye nokudluliswa nokuthuyelwa kukagesi.

nso: ka morago mo ngwageng wo, re tla ala molaokakanywa wo o mpshafaditšwego wa taolo ya mohlagase go fetoša lekala la mohlagase gomme ra thoma mmaraka wa mohlagase wa phadišano.
zul: uhulumeni uzomeseka u-eskom ekutholeni uxhasomali olwengeziwe ukuze akwazi ukuthenga udizili kuze kuphele lo nyakamali esiwuphethe.

nso: bjale ka ge go boletšwe ka mosegamanye, gape ka kgopolo ya go šogana le bothata bja kgaotšo ya mohlagase, re ya go tšwela pele ka go thoma ka diphanele tša didirišwa tše di dulago godimo ga marulelo tša mohlagase wa letšaši.
zul: lokhu kubhekeke ukuthi kunciphise ubude nokuphindaphindeka kakhulu kokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga njengoba u-eskom ezokwazi ukusebenzisa izikhungo zakhe eziphehla ugesi ngodizili lapho uhlelo lokuphakelwa kukagesi lungaphansi kwengcindezi.

nso: mo polelong ya gagwe ya tekanetšo, tona ya matlotlo o tla bolela ka moo malapa a ka thušwago le ka moo dikgwebo di tla kgonago go holega go tšwa go phokoletšo ya motšhelo.
zul: u-eskom wethule uhlelo lokuthenga amandla kagesi ezinkampanini ezizimele eziphehla ugesi ongaphezulu kwalowo eziwudingayo futhi usewutholile kakade ugesi ongama-300 mw ovela emazweni angomakhelwane.

nso: kgoro ya matlotlo a setšhaba e šoma ka diphetogo tša kadimo yeo e swanetšwego go bušetšwa morago go thuša dikgwebo tše dinnyane go beeletša go didirišwa tša mohlagase wa letšaši, le go dumelela dipanka le diinstitušene tša ditšhelete tša kaonafatšo go adima ditlamo tše ditšhelete gore di kgone go sepediša go hirišwa ga didirišwa tša mohlagase wa letšaši go bareki ba tšona.
zul: umbutho wamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (i-saps) sewusungule ithimba elikhethekile elibandakanya abaholi abaphezulu ukubhekana nenkohlakalo nobusela obuthe chithi saka futhi obulokhu buqhubeke njalo eziteshini eziningana eziphehla amandla kagesi okuyinto esiholele ekutheni lezi ziteshi zingasebenzi ngendlela egculisayo.

nso: dikhamphani tše mmalwa tšeo di kgathilego tema mo lenaneong la mohlagase wo o dirilwego ka letšatši le moya kgauswanyane di tla thoma go aga gomme tša tšweletša mohlagase wo mofsa wo o ka bago 2 800 mw.
zul: njengengxenye yenqubo ebanzi yokwenziwa kwezinguquko, kuyaqhubeka ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom esakumemezela ngaphambilini futhi inkampani kazwelonke yokudluliswa nokuthunyelwa kukagesi izoqala khona maduze nje ukusebenza futhi izoba nebhodi elizimele.

nso: eskom e tla reka mohlagase wa tšhoganetšo woo o tla tlišwago nakong ya dikgwedi tše tshela go tswalela lešoba la bjako.
zul: ngokuhamba kwalo nyaka, sizokwethula umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyela umthetho wokulawulwa kukagesi ukuze kulethwe uguquko emkhakheni wezamandla kagesi futhi kusungulwe imakethe kagesi enokuncintisana okufanele.

nso: re beeletša go mathale a mohlagase a ditiši tše dinnyane, kudu mo dikarolong tša go swana le kapa bohlabela, kapa leboa le kapa bodikela.
zul: njengoba ngasho ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule, futhi ngenhloso yokuxazulula inkinga yokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga, sizoqhubekela phambili nokukhishwa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga abekwa ophahleni.

nso: mohlagase wo o tla sepelelana le mehlagase ya go fapana ye re nago le yona, go akaretšwa ditiši tša go fehla mohlagase wa malahla, mohlagase wa letšatši, mohlagase wa go fehliwa ka moya, gase, nyuklea, mohlagase wa go fehlwa ka meetse le wo o bolokelwago mo dipetering.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinguqukwana ezithile ohlelweni lokubolekisa ngemali yokuvuselela amabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, phecelezi i-bounce-back loan scheme ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi amancane ekuthengeni ubuchwepheshe nemishini kagesi welanga, futhi ukuze kuvunyelwe amabhange kanye nezikhungo zezimali yentuthuko zikwazi ukuboleka ngqo kulolu hlelo ukwenza lula ukuqashiswa kwamaphaneli kagesi welanga kumakhasimende azo.

nso: go phethagatša leano le ka botlalo, re nyaka tshepedišo ya felo gotee ye maatla le kgato ye bohlokwa.
zul: enye yezinguquko ezinohlonze esizenzile wukuvumela abathuthukisi-mhlaba abazimele ukuthi baphehle ugesi.

nso: ka nako ya masetlapelo, re nyaka lefelo le tee la taolo le mokgwa o tee wa go dira dilo.
zul: njengamanje sekunemiklamo engaphezu kwe-100, okulindeleke ukuthi ihlinzeke ngamandla amasha kagesi angama-9 000 mw ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

nso: re swanetše go tšea magato go fokotša khuetšo ya bothata mo dipolaseng, go dikgwebo tše dinnyane, go infrastraktšha ya rena ya meetse le netweke ya rena ya dinamelwa.
zul: sitshala izimali kumakhebuli nengqalasizinda entsha yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi kanye neziteshi ezincane, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni ezinjengempumalanga kapa, nyakatho kapa kanye nentshonalanga kapa.

nso: senthara ya taolo ya masetlapelo ya setšhaba e hlophile bothata bja mohlagase le khuetšo ya yona bjalo ka masetlapelo.
zul: zonke lezi zinyathelo zizoholela ekukhuleni okukhulukazi kwamandla kagesi athunyelwa esikhungweni sikazwelonke samandla kagesi kulezi zinyanga eziyi-12 kuya kweziyi-18 ezizayo, kuya phambili.

nso: ka gona, re tsebiša seemo sa masetlapelo sa setšhaba go arabela bothata bja mohlagase le ditlamorago tša gona.
zul: la mandla kagesi azohlinzekwa ngendlela ehambisana nemithombo yethu kagesi oxubile kubandakanya iziteshi zethu ezikhona njengamanje eziphehla amandla kagesi ngamalahle, ugesi welanga, ugesi womoya, ugesi ophehlwa ngegesi, ugesi wenuzi, ugezi wamanzi kanye nogesi ogcinwe kubuchwepheshe bamabhethri.

nso: tona ya taolo ya tirišano le merero ya setšo o ngwadile pego ya seemo sa masetlapelo ka kuranteng ya mmušo, yeo e tla thomago ka bjako.
zul: ukuze luqaliswe ngokuphelele lolu hlelo, sidinga ukulawulwa okunohlonze okuzokwenziwa esizindeni esisodwa futhi sidinga nezinyathelo ezisheshayo futhi ezinohlonze.

nso: seemo sa masetlapelo a setšhaba se tla kgontšha dikgato tša nnete tšeo re hlokago go di tšea go thekga dikgwebo mo tšweletšong ya dijo, poloko le go reka dilo, go akaretša metšhene ya go tokiša mabone, diphanele tša sola le kabo ya mohlagase ya go se kgaotšwe.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nesimo esinzima, sidinga isizinda esisodwa esizohlinzeka ngemiyalelo futhi sidinga umgudu wokusebenza owodwa ozolandelwa.

nso: moo go kgonegago, e tla re kgontšha go tlogela infrastraktšha ye bohlokwa go swana le maokelo le mafelo a go hlwekiša meetse go kgaotšo ya mohlagase.
zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo ukunciphisa umthelela wale nkinga kubalimi, kumabhizinisi amancane, kwingqalasizinda yethu yamanzi kanye nasohlelweni lwethu lonkana lwezokuthutha.

nso: gape e tla re dumelela go potlakiša diprotšeke tša mohlagase le go fokotša dinyakwa tša taolo mola re hlokomela ditšhireletšo tša tikologo tša bothata.
zul: ngenxa yalokho-ke isizinda sikazwelonke sokuphathwa kwenhlekelele sesinqume ukuthi inkinga yamandla kagesi kanye nomthelela wayo kuthathwe njengenhlekelele.

nso: mohlakišiphethiši o tla akaretšwa go kgonthiša tekolo ye e tšwelago pele ya ditshenyagelo, go lebelela tshenyo efe goba efe ya ditšhelete tšeo di nyakegago go šogana le masetlapelo a. go šogana gabotse ka tšhoganetšo le ditlhohlo tše re lebanego le tšona, ke tla kgetha tona ya mohlagase ka ofising ya mopresidentse go thoma maikarabelo ka botlalo a go bona gore dintlha ka moka tša bothata bja mohlagase, go akaretša mošomo wa komiti ya masetlapelo a mohlagase a setšhaba.
zul: ngakho-ke, simemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele ukuze kubhekwane nenkinga kagesi nemithelela yayo.

nso: tona o tla nepiša nako ka moka gomme a šoma le boto ya eskom le taolo go fediša kgaotšo ya mohlagse le go kgonthiša gore leano la kgato ya mohlagase le a phethagatšwa ntle le go senya nako.
zul: ungqongqoshe wezokubusa ngokubambisana nezindaba zendabuko usanda kushicilela ukumenyezelwa kwesimo senhlekelele kusomqulu kahulumeni, okuyisimemezelo esizoqala ngokushesha ukusebenza.

nso: bjale gore go tlošwe kgakanego efe goba efe, tona ya dikgwebo tša mmušo e tla dula e le moemedi wa bengdišere ba eskom gomme a sepediša peakanyo lefsa ya eskom, go kgonthiša go thongwa ga khamphani ya mohlagase, ya lebelela phethagatšo ya lenaneo la phetogo ya mohlagase, le go lebelela go thongwa ga khampani ya peeletšo ya dikgwebo tša mmušo (di-soe).
zul: isimo senhlekelele sizosivumela ukuthi sihlinzeke ngezinyathelo ezinohlonze futhi eziphathekayo esizidingayo ukulekelela amabhizinisi ekukhiqizweni kokudla, ekugcinweni kwempahla kanye nokuthengwa nokuthengiswa kwempahla ezitolo, kubandakanya nokukhishwa kwemishini ephehla ugesi (amajeneretha), amaphaneli kagesi welanga kanye nokuphakelwa kwamandla kagesi okuqhubekayo futhi okunganqamuki.

nso: tshepetšo ya go beakanya lefsa mmušo e tla re fa sebaka sa go laola peakanyo ya dikarolo tše mmalwa tša maikarabelo le gore diofisi tša ditona le dikgoro di ka šomela gabotse bjang dinepo tša rena tša setšhaba.
zul: lapho kunokwenzeka, lokhu kuzosivumela ukuba sikwazi ukubhekelela ngokukhethekile ingqalasizinda ekhethekile nesemqoka kakhulu enjengezibhedlela kanye nezizinda lapho kuhlanzwa khona amanzi, ngokuthi ungacinywa ugesi oya kulezi zikhungo.

nso: re nepiša šedi ya rena go bothata bja mohlagase gonabjale le go šogana le go beakanya lefsa ga mmušo mo nakong ya go se fetše pelo.
zul: futhi lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi sisheshise imiklamo yamandla kagesi futhi sinciphise izidingo zokulawula, kusenjalo futhi sigcine izinqubo ezinqala zokuvikelwa kwemvelo, imigomo yokuthengwa kwempahla-kusebenza kanye nemisebenzi kanye namazinga okumele athotshelwe okuqhutshwa komsebenzi ngendlela efanele.

nso: se se a hlokega ka gore karabelo ya maleba ya bothata bjo e akaretša dikgoro tša go fapana tša dikgoro le makala ao a nyakgo tshepedišo go tšwa gare ga mmušo.
zul: umcwaningimabhuku jikelele uzojutshwa ukuba aqinisekise ukuqashelwa nokuhlolwa ngokuqhubekayo kochithomali, ukuze kugwenywe ukuxhashazwa nokusetshenziswa ngokungafanele kwezimali ezidingekayo ukubhekana nale nhlekelele.

nso: re tla be re akaretša badirišani ba bangwe mo go sebopego sa bokgoni sa go swana le seo re se beilego go sepetša go thoma ka meento.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane kahle futhi ngokushesha nezinselele esibhekene nazo, ngizoqoka ungqongqoshe wezikagesi ozozinza ehhovisi likamongameli ukuze kube nguyena ozokwenza ngokuphelele umsebenzi wokwengamela konke okuphathelene nezinyathelo esizithathayo ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi, kubandakanya nomsebenzi wekomidi likazwelonke lokubhekana nenkinga kagesi.

nso: ga se ra swanela go dikologa, gape ga se ra swanela go ditelega, go phethagatša magato a. ge re tšea magato a go rarolla mathata a mohlagase, re gopola ka kotsi yeo phetogo ya leratadima e e tlišago setšhabeng sa rena.
zul: ungqongqoshe uzogxila kulo msebenzi ngokuphelele futhi asebenzisane nebhodi kanye nabaphathi baka-eskom ekuqedeni ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kanye nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi luqaliswa ngokushesha futhi ngaphandle kokubambezeleka.

nso: ditiragalo tša boso tše dišoro, go swana le komelelo, mafula le hlaga di oketša kotsi go maphelo, go phela gabotse le polokego ya batho.
zul: ukuze kuqedwe noma yikuphi ukudideka, ungqongqoshe wezamabhizinisi kahulumeni kusazolokhu kunguyena ummeleli womninimasheya kwa-eskom futhi ozoqhuba ukuhlelwa kabusha kuka-eskom, nokuqinisekisa ukusungulwa kwenkampani yokudlulisa nokuthumela ugesi, nokwengamela umsebenzi wokuqaliswa kohlelo lokuguqukela kugesi ohlanzekile oluqhutshwa ngobuqotho nobulungiswa, kanye nokwengamela ukusungulwa kwenkampani engumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe), phecelezi i-state-owned enterprises holding company.

nso: re tla tšwela pele go ya go ekonomi ya khapone ya fase ka lebelo leo naga ya rena e ka le kgonago le ka mokgwa woo o kgonthišago tšhireletšo ya enetši.
zul: inqubo yokuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni izosinikeza ithuba lokubheka nokuhlonza ukuthi imisebenzi ehlukahlukene izokwenziwa kuyiphi imikhakha kanye nokuthi amahhovisi ongqongqoshe ahlukahlukene kanye neminyango ingalekelela kanjani ngokuphelele ekufezekiseni izinjongo zethu zikazwelonke.

nso: re tla thoma phetogo ya rena ka tsela yeo e bulago dikgonagalo tša dipeeletšo tše difsa, kgolo ya ekonomi le gape, godimo ga tše ka moka, go hlola mešomo ye mefsa.
zul: okwamanje sigxile kakhulu enkingeni yamandla kagesi futhi ukuhlelwa kabusha kukahulumeni yinto esizoyenza ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

nso: khomišene ya klaemete ya mopresidente e hlahla bontši bja mošomo wo, gomme, ka go dira bjalo, e aga mmotlolo wo mofsa wa kakaretšo le go tšea diphetho ga go kopanelwa, go akaretšwa batho, bašomi, le ditšhaba tšeo di amilwego mo phetogong.
zul: lokhu kudingekile ngoba phela ukuthathwa kwezinyathelo ezifanele ukubhekana nale nkinga kubandakanya iminyango nezikhungo eziningana ezihlukahlukene okuyinto edinga ukulawulwa ngendlela efanele okuvela kwiziphathimandla eziphezulu zikahulumeni omkhulu.

nso: makala a mafsa a mmalwa a thoma go ba gona ka ekonoming, go swana le dilo tše dikgolo tša go se šilafatše tikologo, dikoloi tša mohlagase le disele tša petrole.
zul: inkinga yamandla kagesi ibeka engcupheni umnotho wethu nokusebenza kwawo kanye nokuxhumana okuhle nensebenziswano emphakathini.

nso: diprotšeke tše mmalwa di šetše di thomile, go akaretša kaonafatšo ya sedirišwa se sefsa ke sasol mo boegoebaai ka kapa leboa, polokelo ya mohlagase ya prieska ka freistata, le lenaneo la haetrotšene valley ka limpopo, gauteng le kwazulu-natala.
zul: izehlakalo zesimo sezulu esixakile ezinjengesomiso, izikhukhula kanye nemililo yequbula zinobungozi obudlondlobalayo empilweni, inhlalakahle kanye nokuphepha kwabantu.

nso: kapa leboa e šetše e gokeditše gabotse r100 bilione ka dipeeletšo mo go diprotšeke tša mohlagase wa letšatši le moya.
zul: sizoqhubeka noguquko lwethu olunobuqotho nobulungiswa lokuguqukela emnothweni ohlanzekile okhiqiza ikhabhoni encane okuyinto esizoyenza ngesivivini esihambisana nesimo esizokwazi ukumelana naso izwe lethu futhi ngendlela eqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamandla kagesi ngokuqhubekayo futhi ngaso sonke isikhathi.

nso: tše le dipeeletšo tše dingwe tše dikgolo ka mohlagase wa letšatši le moya di tla hlola mešomo le go hlohleletša diekonomi tša gae e sego fela ka kapa leboa, eupša le ka kapa bohlabela, kapa bodikela le mpumalanga, go dira gore le leganata e be sedirišwa se segolo sa mohlagase.
zul: ukuguqukela kwethu ngobuqotho nobulungiswa kugesi ohlanzekile sizokwenza ngendlela ezovula amathuba amasha otshalomali, kusungule izimboni ezintsha futhi ngaphezu kwakho konke, kube wuguquko oludala imisebenzi emisha.

nso: godimo ga tše ka moka, phetogo ya rena e tla lebelela kudu bašomi ba ditšhaba tša ka diintastering tšeo di lego kotsing go kgonthiša gore ga go na yoo a tlogelwago morago.
zul: ikhomishani yesimo sezulu kamongameli iyona elawula ingxenye enkulu yalo msebenzi, futhi, ngokwenza njalo, yakha uhlelo olusha lokuthathwa kwezinqumo okubandakanyayo futhi okwenziwa ngokuhlanganyela, ngokuthi kubandakanywe umuntu ngamunye, abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi ekhahlamezeke kakhulu ngenxa yalolu guquko.

nso: maafrika borwa ao a rategago,ekonomi ya rena e hloka go gola ka lebelo ge re nyaka go fokotša tlhokego ya mešomo.
zul: ngokusebenzisa uhlelo lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa, kuzotshalwa isamba semali engamathriliyoni angu-1.5 amarandi emnothweni wethu kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo emikhakheni emisha enjengomkhakha wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo, ihayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo kanye nezimoto ezisebenza ngogesi.

nso: badirišini ba leago ba bontšhitše maikemišetšo a bona a go phetha tumelelano ya leago gomme ba tšwetše pele go šoma ka tlhako go kgontšha kgato ya tirišano mo dikarolong tše bohlokwa go swana le mohlagase, dinamelwa le lotšistiki, tlholo ya mešomo le kaonafatšo ya mabokgoni, peeletšo le go dira tša gae, tšhireletšo ya leago, bosenyi le bomenetša.
zul: kuneminye imikhakha emisha eminingana equbukayo emnothweni, njengomkhakha omkhulukazi wehayidrojini engayinukubezi imvelo, izimoto ezisebenza ngogesi kanye namaseli akhiqiza ugesi ngamakhemikhali, phecelezi ama-fuel cell.

nso: le ge re dula re ikgafile go fihlelela ditumelalano tše difsa go makala ka moka, re amogetše tirašano ya nnete go dikarolo tše di itšego.
zul: kunemiklamo eminingana eqhubekayo kakade kubandakanya ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhungo esisha ngabakwa-sasol e-boegoebaai enyakatho kapa, i-prieska power reserve efreyistata, kanye nomklamo wokukhiqiza ugesi ngehayidrojini, i-hydrogen valley initiative oqhutshwa e-limpopo, e-gauteng nakwazulu-natali.

nso: re bone ka mananeo a go swana le sekhwama sa solidarity seo se beakanyago setšhaba, go kgatha tema ga badudi go fihlelela dinepo tša go swana, le ditirišano go fediša dikgaruru tšeo di hlolwago ke bong le dipolao tša bana le basadi (gbvf), le go arabela phetogo ya leratadima.
zul: le miklamo kanye neminye yotshalomali olufakwe emkhakheni wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo izokwakha imisebenzi futhi ikhuthaze nokusimama kweminotho yendawo hhayi nje kuphela enyakatho kapa kodwa ngisho nasempumalanga kapa, entshonalanga kapa kanye nasempumalanga imbala, okuyinto ezoguqula ngisho ugwadule olome kakhulu lube yisikhondlakhondla somthombo wamandla kagesi.

nso: re bone dikholego tša mokgwa wo go godiša peeletšo le go godiša maano a magolo mo lekaleng la ekonomi go swana le dinamelwa, diaparo le mašela, dikgogo, swikiri, temo le ditirelo tša kgwebo tša lefase.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, uguquko lwethu lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ahlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa luzobeka eqhulwini abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi esezimbonini ezisengcupheni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi akekho noyedwa umuntu ozosala ngemuva.

nso: maano a magolo ao a phethilwego a thekga magato a go tšoša makala a maleba, go tsenywa ga peeletšo ka lekaleng la praebete le tlholo ya mešomo ye mefsa le mekgwa ya batho ya go iphediša.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, umnotho wethu kudingeka ukuthi ukhule ngesivinini esikhudlwana impela uma sifuna ukunciphisa ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngendlela ebonakalayo nephawulekayo.

nso: re thaba ka gore badirišani ba leago, kudu dikgwebo, ba dutše ba efa thekgo go phethagatša leano la phethagatšo ya mohlagase ka moya wa tirišano.
zul: kwi-sona ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngenhloso yethu yokwakha isivumelwano esibanzi phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi yonkana esabe sizohlanganisa bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ngaphansi kohlelo olulodwa lokwakha kabusha umnotho wethu kanye nokuvumela ukukhula okuphakeme.

nso: gape, re na le tirišano ye botse ya mošomo le bobedi mešomo le setšhaba go thekga dikarolo tše dingwe tša bothata bja mohlagase.
zul: asikwazanga ukuphothula isivumelwano somphakathi wonkana ngesikhathi esabe silindelekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwezimo ezintsha eziningana ezenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuthi kube nokuvumelana nabo bonke okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini.

nso: bjale ka ge mohlagase o le bohlokwa go kgolo ya ekonomi, go no swana le kabo ya meetse ya go tshepega le dinamelwa tša bokgoni le lenaneo la infrastraktšha ya ditsela.
zul: labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathi bazwakalise inhloso yabo yokwenza isivumelwano nohulumeni futhi baqhubekile nomsebenzi wokwakha uhlaka oluzovumela ukuthatha izinyathelo ngokuhlanganyela emikhakheni emqoka njengokagesi, ezokuthutha nokuhanjiswa kwempahla, ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, utshalomali nokulungiswa ngokuphelele kwemikhiqizo yezimbiwa neminye ngaphakathi kuleli, ukuvikelwa komphakathi, ubugebengu kanye nenkohlakalo.

nso: diporo tša rena di kwele bohloko nako ye telele ka lebaka la go se hlokomelwe, go se lokišwe, mešongwana ya bosenyi le go hloka bokgoni.
zul: ngenkathi sisalokhu sizibophezele ekwakheni ukuvumelana okusha phakathi kwayo yonke imikhakha yomphakathi wethu, siphinde futhi sathatha izinyathelo eziphathekayo zokubambisana ezindaweni ezithile.

nso: re šoma go phatlalala le mmušo go godiša leano la peakanyo la transnet leo le tla fetolelago maikgafo a pholisi ya rena go ba nnete, go akaretša go beakanya lefsa ditimela tša meralo tša transnet go hlola molaodi wa infrastraktšha wa ka thoko ka netweke ya ditimela ka diphalane 2023. transnet le dikhamphani tša lekala la praebete di tla phetha ka tirišano mo ditheminalaeng tša durban le ngqura, go kgontšha peeletšo ye mphsa mo maemakepeng a rena gomme ya kaonafatša bokgoni bja wona.
zul: siyakubona ukuzibophezela kwabo bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ezivumelwaneni ezenziwe ngenhloso yokulwisana nobhubhane lwe-covid-19 kanye nokuqhuba uhlelo lokugoma olungolukhulukazi emlandweni wethu.

nso: go bile le katlego ye mpsha go tloša theminale ya dinamelwa ya port elizabeth, e pedifaditše bokgoni bja yona gomme e bone koketšego go kišontle.
zul: sizibonile izinhlelo ezinjengesikhwama sobumbano ezigqugquzele umphakathi, zakhuthaza ubushoshovu bezakhamuzi futhi zanxenxa uxhasomali ukuze kufezekiswe izinhloso ezifanayo, futhi okuyizinhlelo ezenziwe ngobambiswano okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-gbvf), kanye nokubhekana ngqo nemithelela yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

nso: go latela peakanyo lefsa yeo e tšwelago pele ka go mokgatlo wa ditimela tša banamedi wa afrika borwa, diporo tša ditimela tša banamedi di butšwe, gomme tša fokotša ditshenyagelo tša go sepela go bašomi ba bantši.
zul: izinhlelo-ngqangi eseziphothuliwe zeseka ukuvuselelwa kabusha kwaleyo mikhakha ethintekile, nokufakwa kotshalomali okwenziwa ngabomkhakha ozimele kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emisha kanye nezindlela zokuziphilisa.

nso: kabo ya go tshepega ya meetse e bohlokwa mo go pheleng gabotse ga batho le kgolo ya ekonomi ya rena.
zul: kuyasithokozisa ukubona ukuthi labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini, ikakhulukazi abamabhizinisi, bebelokhu behlinzeka ngokweseka ukuqaliswa kohlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi ngokomoya wobambiswano nokwenziwa kwezivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana.

nso: go kgonthiša tšhireletšo ya meetse gonabjale le ka moso, kgoro ya meetse le kelelatšhila e etile pele tshepetšo ya go beeletša protšekeng ye kgolo ya infrastraktšha go phatlalala le naga.
zul: ngokufanayo, sesakhe ubambiswano nensebenziswano eqinile nabasebenzi ngokunjalo futhi nomphakathi ekusekeleni eminye imikhakha yezinhlelo zokubhekana nenkinga yamandla kagesi.

nso: ka morago ga go ditelega mengwaga ye mmalwa, mešomo ya kago ye e feletšego ya protšeke ya karolo ya bobedi ya lesotho highlands e tla thoma ngwaga wo.
zul: njengoba amandla kagesi ebalulekile ekukhuleni komnotho, kubalulekile futhi nokutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kanye nohlelo lwezokuthutha olusebenza kahle kanye nengqalasizinda yomgwaqo.

nso: protšeke ya lesotho highlands e bohlokwa go kgonthiša tšhireletšo ya kabo ya meetse ka gauteng, freistata, mpumalanga, leboa bodikela le kapa leboa.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela lukhahlamezekile ngenxa yeminyaka eminingi kungatshalwa izimali kulona ngendlela efanele, ungenziwa nomsebenzi wokulungisa, nezenzo zobugebengu kanye nokungaqhutshwa neze kahle komsebenzi.

nso: mengwaga ye mmalwa ka morago ga go šišinywa le mengwaga ye senyane ka morago ga moletlo wa go ribolla lekwate o swerwe, karolo ya mathomo ya protšeke ya meetse ya umzimvubu e tla thoma mo ngwageng wa ditšhelete wa go latela.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana ngqo nalokhu, ngonyaka odlule, samukela inqubomgomo kazwelonke yezezitimela ukuze isihole ekwenzeni umkhakha wezitimela ube ngowesimanjemanje futhi kulethwe uguquko kuwona, kuhlinzekwe, phakathi kokunye, ngokufinyelela kwezikhungo nezinkampani ezingaphandle kukahulumeni ohlelweni lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela.

nso: karolo ye, yeo e akaretšago kago ya letamo la ntabelanga, infrastraktšha ya go nwešetša le kabo ya meetse go ditšhaba, di tla thekgwa ka ditšhelete ke mmušo.
zul: kuhulumeni wonkana sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa umhlahlandlela wakwa-transnet ozoguqula izibophezelo zenqubomgomo yethu zibe yinto eyenzekayo, ephathekayo futhi ebonakalayo, kubandakanya ukuhlelwa kabusha komkhakha wakwa-transnet wokuthuthwa kwempahla ngezitimela ukuze kwakhiwe umphathi wengqalasizinda oseceleni ozoqondana ngqo nohlelo lokuthutha ngezitimela ngaphambi kokuphela kukamfumfu 2023. u-transnet kanye nezinkampani zomkhakha ozimele bazokwenza izivumelwano zokubambisana nokusebenzisana esikhumulweni semikhumbi sasethekwini nesasengqura, ukuze kuvunyelwe ukungena kotshalomali olusha emachwebeni ethu futhi kuphuculwe nendlela aqhuba ngayo umsebenzi.

nso: karolo ya go latela e tla ba kago ya letamo la lilane, leo le akaretšago setiši sa mohlagse wa meetse.
zul: lokhu kuzolekelela amachweba ethu ukuthi abuyele endaweni abekuyo emhlabeni ngokuthi aphinde athathwe njengamanye amachweba awuqhuba ngobunyoninco obukhulu umsebenzi wawo.

nso: diprotšeke tše dikgolo go oketša bokgoni bja letamo la clanwilliam, letamo la hazelmere le letamo la tzaneen di tla kaonafatša kabo ya meetse go lewatle la bodikela, ethekwini le karolo ya bohlabela ya limpopo.
zul: inkulu kakhulu impumelelo ezuziwe emsebenzini wokuguqula isimo sokusebenza kwesikhumulo sezimoto sase-port elizabeth, esesiwuphindaphinde kabili umthamo waso futhi osekuqalile kusona ukubonakala komthamo ophakeme wemikhiqizo ethunyelwa emazweni angaphandle.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, re tsebišitše leano la kaonafatšo ye kgolo go mpshafatša tshepetšo ya kgopelo ya laesense ya go šomiša meetse, yeo e lego bohlokwa go kgontšha peeletšo ye kgolo.
zul: likhulile impela inani lezimoto ezithunyelwa ezimakethe zaphesheya eziphuma esikhumulweni sezimoto sase-port elizabeth.

nso: go tloga moo, re fedišitše tšhalelelo morago ya dilaesense tša tšhomišo ya meetse ra fokotša nako ya go phetha ya dikgopelo go ya go matšatši a 90. lenaneo la go aga infrastraktšha ya rena ke go hwetša sekgoba ka mošomo wa sekhwama sa infrastraktšha le infrastraktšha ya afrika borwa, yeo e dirilwego go thekga protšeke ya infrastraktšha ya peakanyo.
zul: futhi u-transnet wenza umsebenzi wokulungisa nokuvuselela izitimela ebezihleli zingasebenzi futhi ukhulisa nenani lezitimela zakhe.

nso: bjo bongwe bja mapheko a magolo go peeletšo ya infrastraktšha ke tlhokego ya mabokgoni a sethekniki le bokgoni bja taolo ya protšeke.
zul: besibhekene nezinselele kwezokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela.

nso: go lokiša se, infrastraktšha ya afrika borwa e abetšwe r600 milione go peakanyo ya protšeke, kudu mo mafelong a metsemagae le ao a sa hlokomelwego.
zul: kulandela ukuhlelwa kabusha kwesikhungo sokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela saseningizimu afrika, iyi-13 imizila yokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela esiphinde yavulwa futhi, osekunciphise kakhulu izindleko zokugibela kubasebenzi abaningi.

nso: mekgwa ya thekgo le peakanyo yeo re e dirišitšego mo mengwageng ye mmalwa bjale e thoma go ba le dipoelo mo go oketšeng peeletšo ya setšhaba ka infrastraktšha.
zul: ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kusemqoka kakhulu kwinhlalakahle yabantu kanye nasekukhuleni komnotho wethu.

nso: ka pherekgong ngwaga wo, diprotšeke tša go bitšar232 bilione di be di tšwela pele gomme diprotšeke tša go bitša r4 bilione di be di phethilwe.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi, manje nasesikhathini esizayo, umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle uhola inqubo yokutshalwa kwezimali emiklamweni yengqalasizinda emikhulukazi ezweni lonkana.

nso: diprotšeke tše di phethilwego di akaretša madulo a mafsa a batho ka gauteng, go mpshafatšwa ga ditsela le kaonafatšo ya maemakepe.
zul: umklamo we-lesotho highlands usemqoka kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuphakelwa kwamanzi e-gauteng, efreyistata, empumalanga, enyakatho ntshonalanga kanye nasenyakatho kapa.

nso: mo kaonafatšong ye kgolo, mokgatlo wa ditsela tša setšhaba wa afrika borwa – sanral – o abetšwe kontraka ya kago ya go ka ba r18 bilione mo dikgweding tše tharo tša go feta.
zul: emuva kwamashuminyaka ambadlwana kwenziwa isiphakamiso futhi emuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye kwabanjwa umcimbi wokuphendula isoyi, isigaba sokuqala somklamo wamanzi i-umzimvubu water project sizoqaliswa kulo nyakamali ozayo.

nso: kago ya leporogo la msikaba le leporogo la mtentu e tla phethwa gomme ya dira gore go sepela ka kapa bohlabela, go be kaone.
zul: lesi sigaba, esibandakanya ukwakhiwa kwedamu i-ntabelanga dam, nengqalasizinda yokuchelela kanye nokuthunyelwa kwamanzi emiphakathini, sizoxhaswa ngezimali nguhulumeni.

nso: peeletšo ye e tla hola kudu intasteri ya kago gomme ya kgontšha tlholo ya mešomo ye megolo, kaonafatšo ya mabokgoni le kimollo ya bohloki, kudu ditšhabeng tša dinagamagae tša kgauswi.
zul: isigaba esilandelayo kuzoba wukwakhiwa kwedamu i-lilane dam, elizobandakanya nesiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ngamanzi.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, re boletše gore re tla oketša kago ya maporogo a dinagamagae bjalo ka karolo ya lenaneo la welisizwe, go kgontšha baagi go fihlelela ka polokego dikolo, mafelo a mešomo le ditirelo.
zul: imiklamo emikhulukazi yokukhuphula umthamo wamadamu i-clanwilliam dam, ne-hazelmere dam kanye ne-tzaneen dam izokwenza ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ogwini olusentshonalanga, ethekwini kanye nasengxenyeni esempumalanga ye-limpopo.

nso: mo ngwageng wo, re tla iša malapa ao a šetšego go thelebišene ya titšitale gomme ra phetha go tima lenaneo la analoko.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, samemezela uhlelo olubanzi lokuguqula isimo okuhloswe ngalo ukuhlela kabusha inqubo yezicelo zamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi, okuyinto esemqoka ekungeniseni utshalomali oluthe xaxa.

nso: se se tla lokolla mehlwaela ye bohlokwa mo go thakgoleng megala ya go thetha ya 5g gomme ya fokotša go bitša tšhelete ye ntši ga data.
zul: kusukela lapho, sesikuqedile ukusalela emuva komsebenzi wokukhishwa kwamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi futhi sabunciphisa nobude besikhathi sezicelo sayofinyelela ezinsukwini ezingama-90.

nso: dikgato tše di tla re batametša go pono ya rena ya phihlelelo ya inthanete ya go se bitše tšhelete ye ntši go batho ka moka.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda seluqala ukuhamba ngesivinini esikhulu impela ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa yisikhwama sengqalasizinda kanye nesikhungo sezengqalasizinda saseningizimu afrika, i-infrastructure south africa, okuyisikhungo esisungulelwe ukweseka imiklamo yengqalasizinda ekhethekile.

nso: ka go sona ya ngwaga wa go feta, re boletše gore re tla bea šedi go maitapišo a rena a go beakanya magato a godimo a peeletšo, seo se lego bohlokwa go godiša ekonomi le go hlola mešomo.
zul: esinye sezithiyo ezinkulukazi kutshalomali lwengqalasizinda wukuntuleka kwamakhono obungoti bomsebenzi kanye namandla okuphathwa kwemiklamo.

nso: re boletše gore re tla fa tlhohleletšo go masolo ao re a dirilego a mengwaga ya go feta ye mehlano go hwetša r1.2 trilione go peeletšo ye mpsha.
zul: ukuze kulungiswe lokhu, i-infrastructure south africa yabelwe isamba esiyizigidi ezingama-600 zamarandi okuyimali eqondiswe emsebenzini wokulungiselelwa kwemiklamo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nezindawo ezingenazo kahle izinsiza.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, khonferense ya peeletšo ya afrika borwa (saic) e hweditše r367 bilione mo maikgafong a peeletšo, ya fihlelela selebanywa sa rena sa mengwaga ye mehlano.
zul: ngomasingana kulo nyaka, iyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-232 zamarandi imiklamo eyakhiwayo kanti futhi beseyiphothuliwe imiklamo ebalelwa kwisamba esiyizigidigidi ezine zamarandi.

nso: mo ngwageng wa go feta, bontši bja maikgafo bo dirile gore dikhamphani tšeo di dirilego maikgafo ao di beeletše difemeng tše difsa, disenthara tša megala, mafelo a go dira disola, megala ya go sepela ka fase ga lewatle, katološo ya tšweletšo le phethagatšo ya ditheknolotši tše difsa.
zul: imiklamo esiphothuliwe ibandakanya imiklamo yezindlu ezintsha zokuhlalisa abantu e-gauteng, imiklamo yokulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamachweba amancane.

nso: sa bohlokwa,dipeeletšo tše di dirile gore go be le mešomo ye mefsa le dibaka tše difsa go dikgwebo tšeo di sa thomago tše dinnyane.
zul: maqondana nemiklamo yentuthuko emikhulu, isikhungo sezemigwaqo sakuleli, i-south african national roads agency – i-sanral – sesihlinzeke ngezinkontileka zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo zenani eliyizigidigidi eziyi-18 zamarandi kule zinyanga ezintathu ezedlule.

nso: mo khonferenseng ye, re tla bea selebanywa se sefsa go beakanya peeletšo ye mpsha ya go feta r2 trilione ka 2028. dipeeletšo tšeo di tšweletšego ka ekonoming go fihla gonabjale di kgathile tema go koketšego ye kgolo ya tšwelotšo ya gae.
zul: lolu tshalomali luzohlomulisa kakhulu imboni yezokwakha futhi luvumele ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi eminingi, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokuxosha indlala, ikakhulukazi emiphakathini yezindawo zasemakhaya eziseduzane.

nso: bošegong bjo, ke nwa meetse go tšwa galaseng yeo e dirilwego wadeville beke ya go feta ke bašomi ba go tšwa katlegong, vosloorus le germiston.
zul: ngokuqhubeka kwalo nyaka, sizofudusela amakhaya asele kwisiginali kamabonakude wedijithali futhi siphothule nenqubo yokucinywa kwesiginali kamabonakude osakaza nge-analogi.

nso: nakong ya ketelo ya ka ya semmušo ka united kingdom ngwaga wa go feta, feme ya afrika borwa e hweditše laesense ya go tšweletša moento wa ka ganong wa kholera la mathomo ka mo afrika borwa.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ingqungquthela yesine yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika, (i-saic) yathola izithembiso zotshalomali oluyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-367 zamarandi, okuyinto ewakhuphule kakhulu amathuba okufezekisa umgomo weminyaka emihlanu wotshalomali okuhloswe ukufinyelela kuwona.

nso: ditumelelano tše dikgolo tša phadišano di dirile gore petrole ye ntši e dirwe mo gae le gore dijo tše dintši di rekwe go tšwa go balemi ba gae.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, eziningi zalezi zibophezelo ziholele ekutheni izinkampani ezenze lezo zibophezelo zitshale izimali emafemini amasha, izizinda ezamukela izingcingo, izikhungo zikagesi welanga, amakhebuli ezokuxhumana ahamba ngaphansi kolwandle, ukwandiswa kwezizinda zokukhiqiza kanye nokwamukelwa nokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe obusha.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, re ikgafile go lokolla peeletšo mo lekaleng la hemepe le dikhanibase.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, lolu tshalomali seluholele emisebenzini emisha kanye namathuba amasha emabhizinisini amancane asafufusa.

nso: re ya go go hloleng maemo a go kgontšha gore lekala le gole.
zul: utshalomali olungenile emnothweni kuze kube manje lulekelelile ekukhuleni kakhulu komsebenzi wokukhiqiza kuleli.

nso: kgoro ya temo, tsošološo ya naga le tlhabollo ya dinagamagae le kgoro ya maphelo di tla šogana le maemo ao a lego gona gonabjale go bjala hemepe le dikhanibase go dumelela go bjalwa ga ka ntle le kgoboketšo ya dipuno go tšwa go balemi ba kgale.
zul: kusihlwa nje, ngiphuza amanzi ngengilazi eyenziwe e-wadeville ngeviki eledlule ngabasebenzi abavela e-katlehong, e-vosloorus nase-germiston.

nso: mošomo wa tšhoganetšo o phethilwe ke mmušo go hlola tlhako ya taolo yeo e kgontšhago semela ka moka, mekgwa ya dinepo ka moka tša maleba tša dihlare tša tlaleletšo, dijo, dibotsefatši, le ditšweletšwa tša intasteri, tšeo di tswalanywago le dikopano tša lefase le mekgwa ye mekaone ya go šoma.
zul: uma uya esibhedlela uyohlizwa, makhulu amathuba okuthi uthole izidambisizinhlungu ezenziwe esikhungweni sokukhiqiza esisezingeni lomhlaba esisempumalanga kapa.

nso: se se akaretša go lebelela ka lefsa ditekanyetšo tša kgoro go kaonafatša lekala le go thekga balemi ba kgale ba bogologolo, le go beakanya phethagatšo ya saps le dikaonafatšo tša molao.
zul: ohambweni lwami olusemthethweni lokuvakashela e-united kingdom ngonyaka odlule, ifemu yaseningizimu afrika yathola ilayisensi yokukhiqiza umgomo wesifo sohudo (ikholera) ophuzwayo okungokokuqala ngqa lapha eningizimu afrika.

nso: ekonomi yeo e golago e swanetše go ba gape ekonomi yeo e akaretšago batho ka moka.
zul: izivumelwano zokuhlanganiswa kwamabhizinisi abe yinkampani eyodwa sezihlinzekele ukuthi imikhiqizo kawoyela engeziwe ilungiswe futhi icwengwe kuleli futhi nokudla okuthe xaxa kuthengwe kubalimi bakuleli.

nso: khonferense ya boraintasteri ba bathobaso yeo e hlomamišitšwego ka mosegamanye ngwaga wa go feta e bontšhitše katlego ya maafrika borwa ba bathobaso mo go tšweletšeng dijo, dikarolo tša dikoloi, fenišara, tšhipi, dikhemikhale le ditšweletšwa tša meepo, go hlola mešomo ye dikete le go oketša ditšweletšwa tša gae.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sazibophezela ekuvuleni amathuba otshalomali emkhakheni wemikhiqizo yensangu.

nso: bjalo ka mohlala wa bokgoni bja theknolotši bja boraintasteri ba, yo mongwe wa bathopa sefoka mo khonferenseng e bile astrofica technologies, khamphani yeo e thomilwego ke mosadi wa mothomoso, jessie ndaba, yeo e fago tharollo ya data ya go šoma ga disathalaete.
zul: umnyango wezolimo, izinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nomnyango wezempilo izolungisa udaba lwezimo ezikhona njengamanje maqondana nokutshalwa kwensangu ukuze kuvunyelwe ukutshalwa kwayo ngaphandle kwezakhiwo kanye nokuqoqwa kwezivuno kubalimi bendabuko.

nso: kgolo le tlholo ya mešomo mo ekonoming ya rena e tla laolwa ke dikgwebo tše dinnyane le dikgwebo tša magareng, ditirišano le dikgwebo tšeo e sego tša semmušo.
zul: lokhu kuzovula amathuba amakhulukazi omnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya zakuleli, ikakhulukazi empumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali nasempumalanga.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta re thakgotše setlamo sa kadimo sa go bušetšwa morago seo se laolwago ke dipanka le diinstitušene tše dingwe tša ditšhelete, gomme se kgonthišwa ke mmušo, go dikhamphani tšeo di nyakago thušo ya ditšhelete go tsoga go tšwa ditlamoragong ga leuba.
zul: uhulumeni uphothula umsebenzi ophuthumayo ukuze kwakhiwe uhlaka lwemithetho elawulayo oluzovumela ukusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo yesihlahla sonke ngokuphelele, nendlela yokusebenza ezovumela imisebenzi evumelekile ukuze isihlahla sisetshenziselwe ukwakha imithi, ukudla, izimonyo, kanye nemikhiqizo yezimboni, ngokuhambisana nezivumelwano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezinkambiso ezingungqaphambili.

nso: kgoro ya tlhabollo ya dikgwebopotlana e tla šoma le kgoro ya matlotlo a setšhaba ka moo setlamo se ka matlafatšago le go thuša dikgwebo tše dinnyane le tša magareng mo lekaleng leo e sego la semmušo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwabiwa kabusha kwezabelomali zeminyango ukuze kuthuthukiswe lo mkhakha futhi kwesekwe abalimi bendabuko, abamnyama, futhi kuhanjelaniswe nomsebenzi we-saps wokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho nezinguquko zokulawula.

nso: se tšere mokgwa wa tirišano, se šoma le dikgoro le mekgatlo mo dikarolong tša go swana le lenaneo la ditokelo tša go epa, dilaesense tša go sepetša dinamelwa tša baeti, di-visa le ditumelelo tša mešomo, thuto ya bomapimpane le lekala leo e sego la semmušo.
zul: ingqungquthela yokuqala yosozimboni abamnyama eyabanjwa ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule yabonisa impumelelo yabantu abamnyama baseningizimu afrika ekukhiqizeni ukudla, izingxenye zezimoto, ifenisha, izingubo zokugqoka, insimbi, amakhemikhali kanye nemikhiqizo yezimayini, osekudale izinkulungwane eziningi zemisebenzi futhi kwafaka isandla kwisambamkhiqizo sezwe.

nso: ngwaga wo, re tla phetha dimpshafatšo go molao wa dikgwebo (molao wa 71 wa 1991) go fokotša mapheko a taolo go dikgwebopotlana, dikgwebo tša magareng le dikgwebo tše dinnyane (di-smme) le ditirišano le go dira gore go be bonolo go borakgwebo/mmakgwebo go thoma dikgwebo.
zul: njengesibonelo sekhono lezobuchwepheshe elimangalisayo losozimboni labo, enye inkampani eyahlabana ngendondo kule ngqungquthela yi-astrofica technologies, okuyinkampani eyasungulwa ngokubambisana ngowesifazane omnyama, u-jessie ndaba, ohlinzeka ngezinsiza zedatha yokusetshenziswa kwamasathelayithi.

nso: ka mokgatlo wa ditšhelete wa dikgwebo tše dinnyane – re beakanya go aba r1.4 bilione go thekga ka ditšhelete borakgwebo/mmakgwebo ba 90 000. mmušo, ka tirišano le sekhwama sa sme sa o šomela go thoma sekhwama sa r10 bilione go thekga kgolo ya smme.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, senze inqubekela phambili ekufezekiseni amazinga aphakeme obunikazi bomnotho kubantu abamnyama.

nso: mmušo o lebeletše kgonagalo ya go ya go aba r2.5 bilione ya sekhwama ya tšehelete yeo e šetšego ya r7.5 bilione go kgoboketšwa go tšwa go lekala la praebete.
zul: manje sekunabasebenzi abangaphezu kwezi-400 000 abanezabelo emafemini abawasebenzelayo.

nso: go fa laesense postbank go tla dira motheo wa go thoma panka ya mmušo yeo e tla abago ditirelo go di-smme, dikgwebo tša basadi le bafsa le ditšhaba tšeo di sa hlokomelwego.
zul: ukukhula nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emnothweni wethu kuzoqhutshwa ngamabhizinisi asafufusa, imifelandawonye kanye namabhizinisi angahlelekile.

nso: ge seboka sa maloko a palamente se dumelela molaokakanywa wo o mpshafaditšwego wa postbank, postbank e sekaseka dikabo tša tirelo ya yona gore e kgone go aba tirelo ya go fapana ye e kgonagalago gape ya go se bitše tšhelete ye ntši go dipanka tša kgwebo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sethula uhlelo lokubolekisa ngemali kumabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, olulawulwa ngamabhange nezinye izikhungo zezimali, futhi oluqinisekiswe nguhulumeni, ukuze kulekelelwe izinkampani ezidinga ukuxhaswa ngezimali ukuba zivuke kwimithelela yobhubhane.

nso: mokgwa wa go šoma gabotse gape wa go swarelela wa go aga ekonomi ke go hlahla batho ka mabokgoni le go tseba go a šomiša.
zul: umnyango wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane uzosebenzisana nomgcinimafa kazwelonke maqondana nokuthi luzoqiniswa kanjani lolu hlelo ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi asafufusa kanye namabhizinisi asemkhakheni ongahlelekile.

nso: ka gona re dutše re šoma go matlafatša kgokagano gare ga mabokgoni ao re a godišago le dinyakwa tša mošomo.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane nenselele yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi entsheni, seluliwe isibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela yokuqasha ngenhloso yokukhuthaza amabhinizinisi ukuthi aqashe abantu abasha abaningi.

nso: ngwaga wo, sekhwama sa mabokgoni sa setšhaba se tla aba r800 milione go godiša mabokgoni mo lekaleng la titšitale le theknolotši ka mmotlolo wo o kaonafaditšwego woo o kgokaganyago tefo ya tlhahlo go dipoelo tša mošomo.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela ukuthi sihlose ukunciphisa izinqubo zemidanti nemicikilisho eminingi kwinkambiso kahulumeni ukuze kuqedwe ukubambezeleka okungenasidingo ezweni lethu okuvamise ukuvimbela inqubekelaphambili esheshayo.

nso: re boeletša boipiletšo bja rena go dikhamphani, dikgoro le di-soe go tloša senyakwa sa boitemogelo bja mošomo go bafsa bao ba nyakago maemo a fase a mošomo.
zul: ithimba lokuncishiswa kwezinkambiso ezibambezelayo elizinze ehhovisi likamongameli eliholwa ngumnu sipho nkosi belilokhu lisebenzisana neminyango ehlukahlukene ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, re boletše gore re tla thwala dialoga tša kholetšheng ya thuto ya sethekniki le diatla le tlhahlo (tvet) mo mošomong.
zul: lokhu kulandele indlela yokusebenza ngokubambisana, ngokuthi kusetshenziswane neminyango kanye nezikhungo zikahulumeni emikhakheni enjengohlelo lwamalungelo okumba ezimayini, amalayisensi abaqhubi bamabhizinisi ezokuthutha kwezokuvakasha, ama-visa nezimvume zokusebenza, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingane ezisencane kanye nomkhakha ongahlelekile.

nso: palo ya baithuti bao ba tsenago tlhahlong ya mešomo ya diatla mo dikholetšheng tša tvet e tla oketšega go tloga go 17 000 go fihla go 30 000 mo ngwageng wa dithuto wa 2023. ye nngwe ya metswako ye bohlokwa ya kgolo ya ekonomi le bokgoni ke go kgona go goketša mabokgoni ao ekonomi e a nyakago.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizophothula izichibiyelo zomthetho wezamabhizinisi, we-1991 (umthetho wama-71 we-1991) ukuze kuncishiswe izithiyo zokulawula kumabhizinizisi asafufusa (ama-smme) kanye nemifelandawonye futhi kwenziwe lula ukuthi osomabhizinisi basungule amabhizinisi.

nso: ka ge re phethile tshekatsheko ya kakaretšo ya lenaneo la visa ya mošomo, re tla sepela ka lebelo go phethagatša maele ao a filwego.
zul: ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sokuxhaswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ngezimali – sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezingu-1.4 zamarandi kosomabhizinisi abangaphezu kwezi-90 000. uhulumeni, ngokubambisana nesikhwama i-sa sme fund usebenzela ukusungula isikhwama esiyizigidigidi eziyi-10 zamarandi ngenhloso yokweseka ukukhuliswa kwama-smme.

nso: ona a akaretša go thoma lenaneo la dintlha la go fetogafetoga go goketša bafaladi ba bokgoni, re phethagatša setlamo sa mongmošomo sa go tshepagala go dira gore tshepetšo ya visa e be bonolo go babeeletši ba bagolo le go mpshafatša dinyakwa tša go dira dikgopelo.
zul: uhulumeni ubheke ukuthi kunokwenzeka yini ukuthi yena ahlinzeke ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezi-2.5 zamarandi kulesi sikhwama bese kuthi lena enye imali esele eyizigidigidi eziyisi-7.5 zamarandi itholakale kwabomkhakha ozimele.

nso: re tla ba gape re tsebiša visa ya go šoma o le kgole le tumelelo ya go ikgetha ya go thoma kgolo ya godimo.
zul: ukuhlinzekwa kwe-postbank ngelayisensi kuzobeka isisekelo sokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso elizohlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezimali kuma-smme, amabhizinisi abantu abasha kanye nawabantu besifazane kanye nemiphakathi engakutholi kahle ukuhlinzekwa ngezinsiza ezifanele.

nso: ka ge lenaneo la kaonafatšo le thomile, re tla tšwela pele go thekga thwalo ya setšhaba le leago go fa mošomo go bao ba o hlokago.
zul: njengoba isigungu sikazwelonke sicubungula isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa weze-postbank, i-postbank ibuyekeza izinsizakalo ezihlinzekayo ukuze ikwazi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezingasebenziseka ngempumelelo futhi ezingambi eqolo ezingasetshenziswa ngabantu esikhundleni sokusebenzisa amabhange ajwayelekile.

nso: ngwaga wa go feta, re boletše ka boleng bja ditlhohleletši tša mešomo tša mopresidente ka go fa mešomo le dibaka tša letseno.
zul: ngakho-ke besisebenza ngenhloso yokuqinisa ukuxhumana phakathi kwamakhono esiwathuthukisayo kanye namakhono adingwa ngabaqashi endaweni yokusebenzela.

nso: lenaneo gonabjale le hlotše dibaka tša go feta milione o tee, le fihlelela profense ye nngwe le ye nngwe le selete se sengwe le se ssengwe mo nageng ya rena.
zul: kulo nyaka, isikhwama sikazweloke samakhono sizohlinzeka ngemali eyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi yokuthuthukisa amakhono emkhakheni wezedijithali nowezobuchwepheshe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo olunobuhlakani bokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha oluxhumanisa inkokhelo yokuqeqeshwa kanye nemiphumela yokuqashwa.

nso: beke ya go feta, sehlopha se sefsa sa bathuši mo dikolong ba 150 000 se thomile go šoma dikolong tša go feta 22 000, seo se fa seriti, tshepo le maitemogelo a bohlokwa a mošomoo go bafsa bao bego bas a šome.
zul: sigcizelela kwikhwelo lethu elibhekiswe ezinkampanini, iminyango kanye nama-soe lokuthi basuse isidingo sokuthi abantu abasha kumele babe nesipiliyoni somsebenzi uma befuna ukuqashwa emisebenzini esesigabeni sokuqala.

nso: sekhwama sa mošomo sa leago se kalatša bakgathatema ba 50 000 mo karolong ya sona ya go latela go thoma mošomo go fihlelela tše dibotse, le tirelo ya bafsa ya setšhaba ye e mpshafaditšwego e tla hlola dibaka tše dingwe tše 36 000 ka mekgatlo yeo e sa dirego letseno le ya setšhaba.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizofaka emsebenzini abafundi abangaphezu kwezi-10 000 abaphothule izifundo zabo emakolishi ezobuchwepheshe namakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa (ama-tvet).

nso: kgoro ya merero ya setšhaba e thwetše sehlopha sa mathomo sa bafsa bao ba sa šomego ba 10 000 go tsenya khomphutheng direkoto tša pampiri tša go feta 340 milione.
zul: sidlulile kuleli nani futhi manje sesizibekele inani esifuna ukufinyelela kulona ngowezi-2023 labafundi abaphothule kuma-tvet abayizi-20 000. inani labafundi abangenela ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobungcweti bamakhono ezandla emakolishi angama-tvet lizokhushulwa lisuka kubafundi abayizi-17 000 liyofinyelela kubafundi abayizi-30 000 ngonyaka wemfundo wezi-2023.

nso: mobi, sefala sa inthanete seo se sa lefelwego sa bafsa ba afrika borwa go hwetša dibaka tša go ithuta le go hwetša letseno.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho nokuzibeka ethubeni lokuncintisana kahle yikhono lokuheha amakhono adingwa ngumnotho.

nso: se se dirilwe ka tirišano le mokgatlo wa tlhabollo ya bafsa wa setšhaba (nyda), woo o tšwelago pele go fa thuša ye bohlokwa go borakgwebo/mmakgwebo ba bafsa le batho bao ba nyakago mošomo.
zul: njengoba sesiwuphothulile umsebenzi obanzi wokubuyekezwa kohlelo lwama-visa omsebenzi, sizoqhubeka ngokushesha ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwezincomo eziphakanyisiwe.

nso: ke reta nyda ka mokgwa woo ba thušago bafsa go hwetša mošomo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukusungulwa kohlelo olusekelwe phezu kwamaphuzu oluguqulekayo ukuze luhambelane nezimo ezihlukahlukene ukuze kuhehwe abantu bakwamanye amazwe abanamakhono, kuqaliswe uhlelo lwabaqashi abathembakele ukuze kwenziwe inqubo ye-visa ibe lula kubatshalimali abakhulu futhi kuhanjelaniswe ngendlela efanele izidingo zokufakwa kwezicelo.

nso: ditlhohletši tša mošomo tša mopresidente le tšona di thekga batho go hwetša letseno go iphediša.
zul: sizokwethula futhi ne-visa yabasebenzi abazosebenza bekude nendawo yokusebenzela futhi kube nohlelo olukhethekile lokubhekelela ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi amasha anamandla nekhono lokukhula ngesivinini futhi anwebeke ngokushesha.

nso: balemipotlana ba e ka bago 140 000 ba amogetše diboutšhara tša go reka dipeu, manyora le didirišwa, gomme ba aba thekgo go tšhireletšo ya dijo le kaonafatšo ya temo.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka uhlelo lwezinguquko, sizoqhubeka nokweseka ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni nasemphakathini ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngomsebenzi kulabo abawudingayo.

nso: maafrika borwa ao a rategago,maemo a go phela a go bitša tšhelete ye ntši ao a golelago godimo a godiša bohloki le go se lekane.
zul: mobi, okuyinkundla ye-inthanethi okungenwa kuyona mahhala eyenzelwe abantu abasha baseningizimu afrika ukuze bakwazi ukufinyelela emathubeni okufunda kanye nokuzitholela imali.

nso: go na le mošomi wa femeng ka gqeberha yoo gonabjale a lebanego le bokamoso bjooo a se nago nnete ya bjona ka ge kgaotšo ya mohlagase e thatafiša dilo.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu nalo futhi luyabeseka abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

nso: go tlaleletša, malapa ao a ka bago dimilione tše pedi ba hwetša meetse a motheo a go se lefelwe, mohlagase wa motheo wa go se lefelwe le go tlošwa ga matlakala ga go se lefelwe.
zul: abalimi abancane abayizi-140 000 bathole amavawusha ezolimo okuthenga imbewu, umanyolo kanye namathuluzi, okuyinto esikhuthaze ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nezinguquko kwezolimo.

nso: tekanyetšo ya rena ye e ka bago 60% e šomišitšwe go seo se bitšwago mogolo wa leago, e fa mehuta ya go fapana ya thekgo, ditirelo tša motheo le thušo go malapa le batho go lwantšha bohloki le tlala.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sesiholele ekulinyweni komhlaba ongamahektha ayizi-640 000. okuhlaba umxhwele kulokhu wukuthi ama-68% kulaba balimi ngabantu besifazane.

nso: go thekga mošomo wo le go arabela go phela ga go bitša tšhelete ye ntši mo go golelago pele, re tla tšwela pele ka mphiwafela wa kimollo ya leago ya batho bao ba sa šomego (srd), woo gonabjale o akaretšago batho bao e ka bago 7.8 milione.
zul: kulo nyaka, sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngamavawusha angeziwe ayizi-250 000 kubalimi abancane.

nso: re tla kgonthiša gore mphiwafela ya leago yeo e lego gona e a oketšwa go šireletša bahloki kgahlanong le infleišene ye e golago.
zul: lezi yizibonelo zomehluko ongenziwa nguhulumeni ezimpilweni zabantu ngokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha, ukusebenza ngobuhlakani kanye nokuzinikela.

nso: mošomo o tšwela pele go dira mokgwa wa thekgo ya letseno la motheo wo o lebantšwego go batho bao ba lego kotsing kudu, go mathata a ditšhelete.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, izindleko zokuphila ezikhulayo zenza sibe sibi kakhulu isimo sobubha kanye nokungalingani.

nso: se se tla agwa go kaonafatšo yeo re e tsibišitšego ka mphiwafela wa srd, go akaretša go kgokaganya ga tshedimošo yeo re nago le yona go phatlalala le mmušo go kgonthiša gore re fihlelela batho ka moka bao ba hlokago thušo.
zul: kunesisebenzi sefemu e-gqeberha manje esesibhekene nekusasa elingacacile neze kahle njengoba ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuwumisa nse umsebenzi wokukhiqiza.

nso: kgoro ya matlotlo a setšhaba e šetša kgonagalo ya magato a tšhoganetšo go fokotša khuetšo ya kgaotšo ya mohlagase go theko ya dijo.
zul: kungumsebenzi wombuso ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikeleka okuyisisekelo lapho kungafanele neze ukuthi kube khona noyedwa umuntu waseningizimu afrika ozithola eyisisulu.

nso: tšhalelo morago ya go šomana le mangwalo a bong bja thoto e ka godimo ga dintlo tša go feta milione o tee, yeo e fihlago go r242 bilione go dithoto tšeo di swanetšego go ba ka diatleng tša malapa a go hloka a afrika borwa.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokhu, kunamakhaya adla imbuya ngothi abalelwa ezigidini ezimbili athola izinsiza eziyisisekelo zamahhala zokuphakelwa ngamanzi, ugesi kanye nokuthuthelwa imfucuza.

nso: re tla nepiša e sego fela go fediša tšhalelo morago ye, eupša go dira lenaneo la bong gore le šome gabotse gape le fihlelelege kudu.
zul: cishe ama-60% esabelomali sethu asetshenziselwa lokho okubizwa ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni, ezihlinzeka ngezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zosizo, izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo kanye nosizo oluqondiswe emakhaya kanye nomuntu ngamunye ngenhloso yokulwisana nobubha nokuxosha indlala.

nso: ge re thoma sona ngwaga wa go feta, kgoro ya mešomo ya setšhaba le infrastraktšha e phethile phethišetšo ya dihektara tše 14 000 tša naga ya mmušo go aga dintlo.
zul: ngenhloso yokweseka lo msebenzi kanye nokulekelela abantu ezindlekweni zokuphila ezilokhu zikhuphuke njalo, sizoqhubeka nokukhipha isibonelelo senhlalo sabangasebenzi (i-srd), njengamanje esifinyelela kubantu ababalelwa ezigidini eziyi-7.8.

nso: phihlelelo ya thuto ya boleng go batho ka moka ke sedirišwa se maatla seo re nago le sona go fediša bohloki.
zul: sizoqinisekisa ukuthi ziyakhushulwa izibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhona njengamanje ukuze sinciphise ukukhahlamezeka kwabantu abampofu ngenxa yokwehla kwamandla emali okudlondlobalayo.

nso: kgoro ya thuto ya motheo e mpshafatša dinyakwa tša disenthara tša ecd go fihlelela thekgo le go kgontšha dikete tše dingwe go hwetša thušo go tšwa mmušong.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lwesibonelelomali esiyisisekelo esiqondiswe kuphela kulabo bantu abadinga ukubhekelelwa kakhulu abadla imbuya ngothi, uma isimo sezimali sikuvumela lokhu ngoba phela umgodlagodla kahulumeni unezidingo eziningi kanti imali ekhona incane.
